title: Prenatal Comfort Massage
description: Soothing, side-lying massage tailored to support comfort, circulation, and rest during pregnancy.

title: Firm and True
description: Grounded, focused work to release deeper layers of tension with care.

title: Gentle and Poetic Swedish
description: Soft, rhythmic touch to support relaxation, grounding, and gentle renewal.

title: Signature Sensory Massage
description: A grounding, full-body sensory massage designed to calm the nervous system and restore quiet presence through warmth, rhythm, sound, and grounding hymalayan salt elements.

title: Still Waters Reset (Lymphatic)
description: A gentle, flowing session designed to calm the nervous system, encourage fluid balance, and restore inner steadiness.

title: ZEN Shiatsu
description: Meridian balancing with full-body rocking and compressions. (Fully clothed — wear soft, comfortable clothing)
